TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit native int extends System.ValueType implements class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable

summary.span: 平台專用的類型，用以代表指標或控點。

span.span: A platform-specific type that is used to represent a pointer or a handle.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 型別設計為其大小為平台特定的整數。The type is designed to be an integer whose size is platform-specific. 也就是這種類型的執行個體預期會在 32 位元硬體和作業系統上的 32 位元和 64 位元硬體和作業系統的 64 位元。That is, an instance of this type is expected to be 32-bits on 32-bit hardware and operating systems, and 64-bits on 64-bit hardware and operating systems. 可以使用型別，這些語言的支援的指標，以及參考資料，並不支援指標的語言之間通用的方法。The type can be used by languages that support pointers, and as a common means of referring to data between languages that do and do not support pointers. 物件也可用來保存控制代碼。 objects can also be used to hold handles. 例如，執行個體的廣泛用於類別以包裝檔案控制代碼。For example, instances of are used extensively in the class to hold file handles. 型別是符合 CLS 規範，而類型不是。The type is CLS-compliant, while the type is not. 只有類型會在通用語言執行平台。Only the type is used in the common language runtime. 大部分都是為了維護架構對稱提供的型別型別。The type is provided mostly to maintain architectural symmetry with the type. 此類型會實作介面。This type implements the interface. ## Examples 下列範例會使用受管理的指標，若要反轉陣列中的字元。The following example uses managed pointers to reverse the characters in an array. 它會初始化之後物件，並取得它的長度，它會進行下列作業：After it initializes a object and gets its length, it does the following: 1. 呼叫Unicode 字串複製到 unmanaged 記憶體為 ANSI （一個位元組） 字元的方法。Calls the method to copy the Unicode string to unmanaged memory as an ANSI (one-byte) character. 此方法會傳回指向的 unmanaged 字串的開頭的物件。The method returns an object that points to the beginning of the unmanaged string. Visual Basic 範例會使用此指標直接;在 c + + 和 C# 範例中，它會轉換為位元組的指標。The Visual Basic example uses this pointer directly; in the C++ and C# examples, it is cast to a pointer to a byte. 2. 呼叫配置 unmanaged 的字串佔用相同的位元組數的方法。Calls the method to allocate the same number of bytes as the unmanaged string occupies. 此方法會傳回指向的 unmanaged 記憶體區塊開頭的物件。The method returns an object that points to the beginning of the unmanaged block of memory. Visual Basic 範例會使用此指標直接;在 c + + 和 C# 範例中，它會轉換為位元組的指標。The Visual Basic example uses this pointer directly; in the C++ and C# examples, it is cast to a pointer to a byte. 3. Visual Basic 範例定義的變數，名為`offset`等於 ANSI 字串的長度。The Visual Basic example defines a variable named `offset` that is equal to the length of the ANSI string. 它用來判斷其位移到 unmanaged 記憶體中複製到其中的 ANSI 字串在下一步 的規範。It is used to determine the offset into unmanaged memory to which the next charter in the ANSI string is copied. 由於其開始值是字串的長度，複製作業會將複製的字元從字串開頭之記憶體區塊的結尾。Because its starting value is the length of the string, the copy operation will copy a character from the start of the string to the end of the memory block. C# 和 c + + 範例呼叫方法來取得的 unmanaged 的指標的起始位址的字串和 unmanaged 的記憶體區塊的它們可以加入一個的 ANSI 字串的起始位址的字串長度大於或等於。The C# and C++ examples call the method to get an unmanaged pointer to the starting address of the string and the unmanaged block of memory, and they add one less than the length of the string to the starting address of the ANSI string. 因為 unmanaged 的字串指標現在會指向字串結尾，複製作業會將複製的字元從字串結尾的記憶體區塊的開始。Because the unmanaged string pointer now points to the end of the string, the copy operation will copy a character from the end of the string to the start of the memory block. 4. 您可以使用迴圈，每個字元複製到 unmanaged 記憶體區塊的字串。Uses a loop to copy each character from the string to the unmanaged block of memory. Visual Basic 範例會呼叫ANSI 字串 managed 指標從指定位移處讀取的位元組 （或位元組字元） 的方法。The Visual Basic example calls the method to read the byte (or one-byte character) at a specified offset from the managed pointer to the ANSI string. 位移會隨著迴圈的每個反覆項目。The offset is incremented with each iteration of the loop. 然後它會呼叫unmanaged 加上的記憶體區塊的開始位址所定義的方法，將位元組寫入的記憶體位址`offset`。It then calls the method to write the byte to the memory address defined by the starting address of the unmanaged block of memory plus `offset`. 然後遞減`offset`。It then decrements `offset`. C# 和 c + + 範例執行複製作業，則遞減 unmanaged ANSI 字串中的下一個位置的位址指標，並遞增至未受管理的區塊中的下一個位址的指標。The C# and C++ examples perform the copy operation, then decrement the pointer to the address of the next location in the unmanaged ANSI string and increment the pointer to the next address in the unmanaged block. 5. 所有範例都呼叫要轉換的 unmanaged 的記憶體區塊，包含複製的 ANSI 字串，為受管理的 unicode物件。All examples call the to convert the unmanaged memory block containing the copied ANSI string to a managed Unicode object. 6. 顯示的原始和反轉字串之後, 呼叫的所有範例方法來釋放 unmanaged 的 ANSI 字串和 unmanaged 的記憶體區塊配置的記憶體。After displaying the original and reversed strings, all examples call the method to free the memory allocated for the unmanaged ANSI string and the unmanaged block of memory. [!code-cpp[System.IntPtr#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.intptr/cpp/topointer.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.IntPtr#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.intptr/cs/topointer.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.IntPtr#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.intptr/vb/topointer.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法不會擲回例外狀況如果結果太大而無法表示為指定的平台上的指標。The method does not throw an exception if the result is too large to represent as a pointer on the specified platform. 相反地，在 unchecked 內容中執行加法運算。Instead, the addition operation is performed in an unchecked context. 不支援運算子多載或自訂運算子的語言可以使用這個方法，將位移加入至指標的值。Languages that do not support operator overloading or custom operators can use this method to add an offset to the value of a pointer. ## Examples 下列範例會具現化物件，指向十個元素陣列的開頭，接著再呼叫方法來逐一查看陣列中的項目。The following example instantiates an object that points to the beginning of a ten-element array, and then calls the method to iterate the elements in the array. [!code-csharp[System.IntPtr.op_Addition#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.intptr.op_addition/cs/op_subtraction1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.IntPtr.op_Addition#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.intptr.op_addition/vb/op_subtraction1.vb#2)] 不支援自訂運算子的語言可以呼叫方法改為。Languages that do not support custom operators can call the method instead. 如果結果太小而無法表示為指定的平台上的指標，減法運算就不會擲回例外狀況。The subtraction operation does not throw an exception if the result is too small to represent as a pointer on the specified platform. 相反地，它會執行在 unchecked 內容。Instead, it is performed in an unchecked context. 這個運算子的對等方法是 The equivalent method for this operator is

summary.span: 將指標值減去移位。

span.span: Subtracts an offset from the value of a pointer.

returns.span: 新的指標，其可反映從 減去 的結果。

span.span: A new pointer that reflects the subtraction of from .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法不會擲回例外狀況，如果結果太小，無法表示為指定的平台上的指標。The method does not throw an exception if the result is too small to represent as a pointer on the specified platform. 相反地，在 unchecked 內容中執行減法運算。Instead, the subtraction operation is performed in an unchecked context. 不支援運算子多載或自訂運算子的語言可以使用這個方法，要減去位移的指標值。Languages that do not support operator overloading or custom operators can use this method to subtract an offset from the value of a pointer. ## Examples 下列範例會具現化物件，指向陣列末端的十項目，然後再呼叫方法來以反向順序逐一查看陣列中的項目。The following example instantiates an object that points to the end of a ten-element array, and then calls the method to iterate the elements in the array in reverse order. [!code-csharp[System.IntPtr.Subtract#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.intptr.subtract/cs/subtract1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.IntPtr.Subtract#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.intptr.subtract/vb/subtract1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 將這個執行個體的值轉換為未指定類型的指標。

span.span: Converts the value of this instance to a pointer to an unspecified type.

returns.span: 的指標，也就是包含未指定類型資料的記憶體指標。

span.span: A pointer to ; that is, a pointer to memory containing data of an unspecified type.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例會使用受管理的指標，若要反轉陣列中的字元。The following example uses managed pointers to reverse the characters in an array. 它會初始化之後物件，並取得它的長度，它會進行下列作業：After it initializes a object and gets its length, it does the following: - 呼叫方法來將 Unicode 字串複製到 unmanaged 記憶體中，為 ANSI （一個位元組） 字元。Calls the method to copy the Unicode string to unmanaged memory as ANSI (one-byte) characters. 此方法會傳回指向的 unmanaged 字串的開頭的物件。The method returns an object that points to the beginning of the unmanaged string. - 呼叫配置 unmanaged 的字串佔用相同的位元組數的方法。Calls the method to allocate the same number of bytes as the unmanaged string occupies. 此方法會傳回指向的 unmanaged 記憶體區塊開頭的物件。The method returns an object that points to the beginning of the unmanaged block of memory. - 呼叫方法來取得的 unmanaged 的指標的起始位址的字串和未受管理的記憶體區塊，並將其中一個的 ANSI 字串的起始位址的字串長度大於或等於。Calls the method to get an unmanaged pointer to the starting address of the string and the unmanaged block of memory, and adds one less than the length of the string to the starting address of the ANSI string. 因為 unmanaged 的字串指標現在會指向字串結尾，複製作業會將複製的字元從字串結尾的記憶體區塊的開始。Because the unmanaged string pointer now points to the end of the string, the copy operation will copy a character from the end of the string to the start of the memory block. - 您可以使用迴圈，每個字元複製到 unmanaged 記憶體區塊的字串。Uses a loop to copy each character from the string to the unmanaged block of memory. 每個複製作業之後，它遞減至 unmanaged ANSI 字串中的下一個位置的位址指標，並遞增在未受管理的區塊中的下一個位址的指標。After each copy operation, it decrements the pointer to the address of the next location in the unmanaged ANSI string and increments the pointer to the next address in the unmanaged block. - 呼叫要轉換的 unmanaged 的記憶體區塊，包含複製的 ANSI 字串，為受管理的 unicode物件。Calls the to convert the unmanaged memory block containing the copied ANSI string to a managed Unicode object. - 顯示的原始和反轉字串之後, 會呼叫方法來釋放 unmanaged 的 ANSI 字串和 unmanaged 的記憶體區塊配置的記憶體。After displaying the original and reversed strings, calls the method to free the memory allocated for the unmanaged ANSI string and the unmanaged block of memory. [!code-cpp[System.IntPtr.ToPointer#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.IntPtr.ToPointer/cpp/topointer.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.IntPtr.ToPointer#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.IntPtr.ToPointer/cs/topointer.cs#1)]

summary.span: 將目前 物件的數值，轉換為其相等的字串表示。

span.span: Converts the numeric value of the current object to its equivalent string representation.

returns.span: 目前 物件值的字串表示。

span.span: The string representation of the value of the current object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`format`參數是`null`或空字串 ("")，傳回的值會以一般格式規範格式化 ("G")。If the `format` parameter is `null` or an empty string (""), the return value is formatted with the general format specifier ("G"). 如需有關數值格式規範的詳細資訊，請參閱[標準數值格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md)主題。For more information about numeric format specifiers, see the [Standard Numeric Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md) topic. 使用文化特性而異來格式化傳回值。The return value is formatted using the invariant culture.

span.span: Standard Numeric Format Strings
Custom Numeric Format Strings

MemberSignature.Value: public static readonly IntPtr Zero;
.field public static initonly native int Zero
Public Shared ReadOnly Zero As IntPtr
public: static initonly IntPtr Zero;
staticval mutable Zero : nativeint

summary.span: 表示已經初始化為零的指標或控點之唯讀欄位。

span.span: A read-only field that represents a pointer or handle that has been initialized to zero.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個欄位的值不等於`null`。The value of this field is not equivalent to `null`. 使用此欄位來有效率地決定的執行個體是否已設定為零以外的值。Use this field to efficiently determine whether an instance of has been set to a value other than zero. 例如，假設該變數中，ip 是的執行個體。For example, assume the variable, ip, is an instance of . 您可以判斷是否藉由比較的建構函式，例如傳回的值將它設定: 「 `if ip != new IntPtr(0)...` "。You can determine if it has been set by comparing it to the value returned by a constructor, for example: " `if ip != new IntPtr(0)...` ". 不過，要叫用的建構函式，以取得未初始化的指標是效率不佳。However, invoking a constructor to get an unintialized pointer is inefficient. 最好是程式碼是 「 `if ip != IntPtr.Zero...` "，或 「 `if !IntPtr.Zero.Equals(ip)...` "。It is better to code either " `if ip != IntPtr.Zero...` ", or " `if !IntPtr.Zero.Equals(ip)...` ". 當從 managed 程式碼呼叫 Windows API，您可以傳遞而非`null`如果引數必須是指標或`null`。When calling the Windows API from managed code, you can pass instead of `null` if an argument is expected to be either a pointer or a `null`. 例如，下列呼叫 Windows`CreateFile`函式提供for`pSecurityAttributes`和`hTemplateFile`引數值。For example, the following call to the Windows `CreateFile` function supplies for the `pSecurityAttributes` and `hTemplateFile` argument values. [!code-csharp[System.IntPtr.Zero#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.intptr.zero/cs/zero4.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.IntPtr.Zero#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.intptr.zero/vb/zero4.vb#2)] > [!NOTE] > 雖然相當於`null`Windows API 函式參數或傳回值可以是任一個指標，或`null`，不等於`null`。Although is equivalent to `null` for Windows API functions with parameters or return values that can be either pointers or `null`, is not equivalent to `null`. 傳遞`null`要`IntPtr.Zero.Equals`方法一律會傳回`false`。Passing `null` to the `IntPtr.Zero.Equals` method always returns `false`. 您也可以測試`null`傳回指標的 Windows API 函式呼叫的傳回值或`null`藉由比較傳回的值與。You can also test for a `null` return value from Windows API function calls that return either a pointer or a `null` by comparing the returned value with . 例如，若要呼叫`GetWindow`在下列範例中的函式會嘗試擷取不存在的視窗控制代碼。For example, the call to the `GetWindow` function in the following example tries to retrieve the handle of a non-existent window. 如果它所呼叫從 unmanaged 程式碼，函式會傳回`null`，但呼叫它時，從 managed 程式碼，它會傳回。If it were called from unmanaged code, the function would return `null`, but when it is called from managed code, it returns . [!code-csharp[System.IntPtr.Zero#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.intptr.zero/cs/zero2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.IntPtr.Zero#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.intptr.zero/vb/zero2.vb#1)]
